newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle steady, moderate trade-USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-S Minn fed cattle steady, moderate trade-USDA.

text.p: Slaughter steers and heifers were steady, compared to Tuesday's close, USDA said.
Trade moderate. Demand uneven, averaging moderate. Seller interest moderate. Offerings current.
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1175-1300 lbs 68.00-69.50.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1075-1200 lbs 69.00-69.50 few to 70.00.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to Tuesday's close - Slaughter steers and heifers unevenly steady.

Steers -Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1150-1300 lbs 110.00-112.00 ld 109.50 Holstein - (weight only) Select and Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 103.00-104.00 Holsteins - ( grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales Select 2-3 1250-1450 lbs no sales.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1000-1200 lbs 110.00-112.00. Confirmed - 4,000 Week Ago - 4,900 Year Ago - 5,800
Wk to Date - 9,300 Week Ago - 30,800 Year Ago - 27,300
